00005 RNG::RNG(int sd, Type t) : t(t)
00006 {
00007     iv = 0;

00011 RNG::~RNG()
00012 {
00013     delete [] iv; // may be NULL if Ran0
00014     iv = 0;
00015     iy = 0;

00018 int RNG::nextBadState() const
00019 {
00020     struct BadStateException : public std::exception
00021     {
00022         const char *what() const throw() 
00023           { return "RNG type is supported for this operation"; }
00024     };
00025     throw BadStateException(); 
00026     return 0; // not reached
00027 }

00029 void RNG::reseed(int seed)
00030 {
00031     if (seed < 0) seed = -seed; // force positive seed
00032     if (!seed) seed = 1; // force nonzero seed;
00033     originalSeed = s = seed;
00034     ct = 0;
00035     delete [] iv;
00036     iv = 0;
00037     iy = 0;
00038     iset = false;
00039 }
00040 
00041 double RNG::range(double p1, double p2)
00042 {
00043     if (t != Gasdev) {
00044         static const double EPS = 1.2e-7; // minimum threshold for 0
00045         static const double RNMX = (1.0-EPS); // theshold for 1
00046         double r = next();
00047         if (r <= EPS) r = 0.;
00048         else if (r >= RNMX) r = 1.0; // to force non-inclusivity
00049         // normal case, p1 is min and p2 is max
00050         return (r/RNMX)*(p2-p1) + p1;
00051     }
00052     // else .. Gasdev case p1 means u (mean) and p2 is stddev (scale)
00053     return next()*p2 + p1;
00054 }
00055 
00056 double RNG::gasdev()
00057 {
00058     double fac,rsq,v1,v2;
00059 
00060     //if (!iv || s < 0) /* if not seeded */ iset = false;
00061     if (!iset) {
00062         do {
00063             v1 = 2.0*ran1f()-1.0;
00064             v2 = 2.0*ran1f()-1.0;
00065             rsq = v1*v1 + v2*v2;
00066         } while (rsq >= 1.0 || rsq == 0.0);
00067         fac = sqrt(-2.0*log(rsq)/rsq);
00068         gset = v1*fac; // cache gset
00069         iset = true;
00070         return v2*fac;
00071     } 
00072     // else used cached gset
00073     iset = false;
00074     return gset;
00075 }

00080 #include <iostream>
00081 #include <iomanip>
00082 #include <sstream>
00083 #include <string>
00084 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00085 {
00086     int s, t;
00087     unsigned n;
00088     std::string str("");
00089     if (argc > 1) str += argv[1];
00090     if (argc > 2) str += std::string(" ") + argv[2];
00091     if (argc > 3) str += std::string(" ") + argv[3];
00092     std::istringstream is(str);
00093     if (argc != 4
00094         || (argc == 4 && ( !(is >> s) || !(is >> t) || !(is >> n) ) || t < 0 || t > 2 ) ) {
00095         std::cerr << "Please pass a seed and a number 0, 1, 2 for Ran0, Ran1, Gasdev, and a count\n";
00096         return 1;
00097     }
00098     std::cerr << "Seed: " << s << ", type = " << t << "\nGenerating " << n << " random numbers:\n";
00099     RNG rg(s,static_cast<RNG::Type>(t));
00100     for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
00101         std::cout << std::fixed << std::setprecision(20) << /*rg.range(0.,1.)*/ rg() << "\n";
00102         if (!(i % 1000000)) 
00103             std::cerr <<  "(Count now: " << i << ")\n";
00104     }
00105     return 0;
00106 }
